divs: Sighting DetailsOut for a ride. The ufo slammed down to the ground, right across the road fromthe car. It bounced up high, then it straightened out, like a beautiful whiterug and wrapped itself around the earth. I was very worried because there was aairplane to the right hand side of the road, just passed the electric wires. Theufo went in a western direction. 6924 road in Deer Park township
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Ottawa
There were no other sightings in Ottawa on or around October 6th 2002
